IIT-Madras.synopsis: IIT-Madras’ self-assessment test has been welcomed by parents and students in at least three states of the country.

IIT-Madras.synopsis: The drive was taken up by the disaster management committee of the institute and the NSS team under the supervision of the student general secretary.

IIT-Madras.headline: IIT-M satellite campus to come up in suburbs
IIT-Madras.synopsis: IIT-Madras is likely to start a satellite campus not too far from the city soon. It will host some of its research facilities in the space.

IIT-Madras.headline: IIT-M tool to detect driver fatigue to hit roads soon
IIT-Madras.synopsis: Driver fatigue is one of the main reasons for accidents, the state transport corporation has realized, and IIT-Madras has developed a tool to help detect fatigue behind the wheel.

IIT-Madras.headline: Pre-placement offers at IIT-B up by 25%

IIT-Madras.headline: IITs battle it out in aquatics meet at Powai campus
IIT-Madras.synopsis: IIT-Madras and IIT-Roorkee took the top spots in the men’s and women’s championships respectively.

IIT-Madras.headline: IIT-Madras may help civic body turn debris into bricks
IIT-Madras.synopsis: Indian Institute of Technology-Madras may soon help teh city corporation recycle construction debris into bricks and other useful things.

IIT-Madras.synopsis: Government schools are usually in the news for all the wrong reasons but a recent survey has ranked Chennai’s Kendriya Vidyalaya-IIT Madras campus at the top. Ten other schools from Tamil Nadu found a place among the top 10 in various categories.

IIT-Madras.synopsis: Government schools many times make news for the lack of facilities, but, a recent survey conducted for government schools in 12 cities and few states has listed Chennai’s Kendriya Vidyalaya- IIT-Madras campus at the first place.

IIT-Madras.headline: Big money still a dream in engineering colleges
IIT-Madras.synopsis: The job offers made during on-campus placements might be increasing, but the dream of bagging salary packages like those secured by students of IIT-Madras remains for students of other colleges.

IIT-Madras.headline: Applications invited for NPTEL online courses
IIT-Madras.synopsis: National Programme on Technology Enhanced Learning (NPTEL) has launched two new online courses -- Basic Electrical Circuits and Introduction to Programming in C.

IIT-Madras.synopsis: Professors from Pondicherry University and IIT-Madras and their students have developed a new type of gel molecule from inexpensive and renewable raw materials.

IIT-Madras.synopsis: The aim of these conventions is to bring students from different parts of India and abroad and expose them to the gurukul way of life.

IIT-Patna.synopsis: The acrimony over the appointment of IIT directors was limited to IIT, Ropar since search-cum-selection committee that met on Sunday has persisted with the earlier choice made for IIT, Patna and Bhubaneshwar.

Copter gatecrashes IIT sports event
